com.xorprogramming.io.utils

Interface Savable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AchievementManager

    public interface Savable
    An interface that defines an object that can be saved and restored. Consider using the SavableIOUtils class to conveniently save and restore Savables.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void restore(ObjectInputStream ois)
      Restores the state of the object from an ObjectInputStream
      void save(ObjectOutputStream oos)
      Saves the state of the object to an ObjectOutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • restore

        void restore(ObjectInputStream ois)
             throws IOException,
                    ClassNotFoundException
        Restores the state of the object from an ObjectInputStream
        Parameters:
        ois - The input stream containing the state
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading from the stream
        ClassNotFoundException - If the class of one of the objects in the object graph cannot be found

      • save

        void save(ObjectOutputStream oos)
          throws IOException
        Saves the state of the object to an ObjectOutputStream
        Parameters:
        oos - The output stream to which the state is written
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while writing to the stream
